thread.title: Axiomtek Introduces the tBOX322-882-FL, an EN50155 and EN50121 Certified Railway Embedded System
thread.title_full: Axiomtek Introduces the tBOX322-882-FL, an EN50155 and EN50121 Certified Railway Embedded System - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Axiomtek Introduces the tBOX322-882-FL, an EN50155 and EN50121 Certified Railway Embedded System
text:
Axiomtek Introduces the tBOX322-882-FL, an EN50155 and EN50121 Certified Railway Embedded System
Axiomteks tBOX322-882-FL is a fanless embedded system with 5th/4th Generation Intel® Core processors for railway applications, certified with EN50155, EN50121.
City of Industry, CA, August 13, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Axiomtek, one of the world's leading designers and manufacturers of innovative, high performance and reliable PC-based industrial computer products, is proud to announce the arrival of the tBOX322-882-FL, its fanless railway embedded PC which offers 5th generation Intel® Core™ i7/i3 or 4th Generation Intel® Core™ i7/i3 processors.
Certified with EN50155 class TX (wide operating temperature -40°C to +70°C), EN50121 and compliant with the standard of railway vehicles fire protection PrCEN TS 45545-2, the tBOX322-882-FL is well suited for IoT and M2M-related applications such as onboard devices controller, train management, data transfer, security surveillance and onboard infotainment controller. To keep all cables tightly secured in rugged environments, the tBOX322-882-FL has standard M12 connectors for its Ethernet ports, USB port, power input, and audio port. The tBOX322-882-FL is notable for its graphics performance, which is twice as powerful compared to previous generations thanks to its quad core processor. This allows the embedded system to perform faster and display higher quality images and videos.
“The Axiomtek tBOX322-882-FL comes equipped isolated DIO, COM and LAN ports for great expansion capabilities,” said Jerry Huang, product manager for Axiomtek’s Product Marketing Division. “The system can be applied to passenger infotainment, train operational and security surveillance network controls, and much more. In particular, the tBOX’s three embedded PCI Express Mini Card slots and two SIM card holders offer extensive communication expansion to 3G/4G, GPS, Wi-Fi and Bluetooth applications. Its significant anti-vibration design can endure up to 5Grms (with CFast™) and 3Grms (with HDD). The powerful and reliable railway box PC also comes with onboard DDR3L 4 GB system memory as well as one swappable 2.5” SATA3 HDD and one CFast™ slot, which provides highly enhanced storage capacity.”
The ruggedized and extreme compact design railway computer tBOX322-882-FL also features user-friendly I/O design. The system’s rich features include four Gigabit Ethernet ports, two isolated COM ports, one isolated DI/DO port, one USB 2.0 ports, two USB 3.0 ports, three audio, one HDMI, one DVI-D, one VDC power input, one remote power switch, one reset switch and four antenna openings.
Axiomtek’s high performance railway embedded computer, the tBOX322-882-FL is available now. More intelligent embedded systems for transportation, energy-saving & utility and automation are also accessible on their website. For more product information, please visit them at us.axiomtek.com. For detailed assistance including pricing, please contact one of their sales representatives at solutions@axiomtek.com or fill out the inquiry form on their website.
Advanced Features:
- EN50155, EN50121 certified for rolling stock transportation application
- Fanless with wide operating temperature range of -40°C to +70°C (-40°F to +176°F, EN50155 class TX)
- Complies with fire protection of railway vehicles European standard PrCEN TS 45545-2
- 5th/4th Generation Intel® Core™ i7 or Intel® Core™ i3 processor (Broadwell/Haswell)
- High performance DDR3L-1600 4 GB memory onboard
- Lockable M12 I/O interface for Gigabit LAN, audio, power and USB 2.0 connectors
- Isolated RS-232/422/485 and DIO ports
- Supports two USB 3.0 ports
- One removable and lockable 2.5” SATA3 HDD and one CFast™ slot
- Three internal PCI Express Mini Card slot and two SIM slots
- Suspension designed for HDD
- HDMI and DVI-D ports
- Reset and remote power switches
About Axiomtek Co., Ltd
Axiomtek Co., Ltd. is one of the world's leading designers/manufacturers of PC-based industrial computer products. From its roots as a turnkey systems integrator specializing in data acquisition and control systems, Axiomtek has mirrored the PC evolution in various industries by shifting its focus toward the design and manufacture of PC-based industrial automation solutions.
Axiomtek Co., Ltd. established in 1990, has more than 60 distributor partners globally. Axiomtek offers Industrial PCs (IPC), Single Board Computers and System on Modules (slot CPU card, small form factor embedded boards & SoM), Fanless & Rugged Embedded System (eBOX, tBOX and rBOX), Touch Panel Computers (TPC), Medical PCs (MPC), Human Machine Interface (HMI), Digital Signage Players (DS), Industrial Network and Network Appliances (NA).
As an associate member of the Intel® Internet of Things Solutions Alliance, Axiomtek continuously develops and delivers cutting edge solutions based on the latest Intel® platforms.
